markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 13"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Bone Investiture](/Feats.aspx?ID=5646) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Lizardfolk" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=760" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 27 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Prerequisites**
[Bone Magic](/Feats.aspx?ID=5632)

</column>

---

You encase yourself in spiritual dinosaur bones to become a Huge dinosaur. You can cast [_dinosaur form_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1489) on yourself as a 5th-rank innate spell once per day.
name: Bone Investiture
